## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (RuboCop passes)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have removed any debug statements (e.g., `puts`, `binding.pry`)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this in a real Rails application

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (under "Unreleased" section)
- [ ] I have added/updated relevant code comments
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation files

### Security
- [ ] My changes do not introduce any security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have considered XSS, SQL injection, and CSRF implications
- [ ] I have used secure coding practices (e.g., parameterized queries, sanitization)

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This PR does not contain breaking changes
- OR
- [ ] I have clearly documented breaking changes in the PR description and CHANGELOG
- [ ] I have updated the version number appropriately (major version bump)
- [ ] I have provided migration instructions for users
